Package io.werval.spi.dev

SPI for the Development Shell.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary  
    Interface Description
    DevShellSPI
    Development Shell Service Provider Interface.
    DevShellSPI.SourceChangeListener
    Listener for source changes.
    DevShellSPI.SourceWatch
    Watch allowing to stop watching.
    DevShellSPI.SourceWatcher
    File watching abstraction.
  • Class Summary  
    Class Description
    DevShellSPIAdapter
    Adapter for DevShellSPI that listen to changes but has NOOP rebuild methods.
    DevShellSPIWrapper
    Development Shell SPI Wrapper.
  • Exception Summary  
    Exception Description
    DevShellRebuildException
    Thrown if something goes wrong while rebuilding the Application in development mode.

Package io.werval.spi.dev Description

SPI for the Development Shell.
